entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update .NET MAUI Blazor hybrid template #22205
    9.0-preview5
  • System.ObjectDisposedException: ObjectDisposed_Generic ObjectDisposed_ObjectName_Name, Android.OS.PowerManager #22204
  • ListViewItem doesn't exists any more #22202
  • PointerGestureRecognizer Does not work on android #22199
  • AbsoluteLayout with SizeProportional not working #22195
  • LineHeight with HTML Label not working #22193
  • [Android] CollectionView EmptyView using a View or Template is not rendering #22191
  • [Android] Deleting an item from the CollectionView takes a long time #22190
  • [Android] Crash updating the ItemSpacing at runtime #22187
  • [Android] CollectionView stutters #22185
  • [Android] Performance issue with Horizontal ScrollView #22184
  • RadioButton with value cannot display selected state correctly #22183

Closed

  • Cannot bind Shell Items #22145
    Backlog
  • App crashes with ArgumentOutOfRangeException when FlyoutItemIsVisible changes (WinUI only) #16929
    Backlog
  • Consider implementing the PointerOver state for .NET 6 #12597
    Backlog
  • Maui Blazor - MacOs - Interacting with input date tag crashes the app. #22181
  • [Android] Performance issues with CollectionView using grouping and variable sizes #22192
  • UI sometimes becomes uninteractive with the mouse after selecting a file from a file input (.NET MAUI Blazor) #15072
  • Flyout button is visible for a split second when navigating back to home page in Android #22144
  • [Android] Large loading time of a Page with CollectionView using template selector #22189
  • [Android] CollectionView ScrollTo using the index not working #22188
  • CollectionView Containing SwipeView Within a Grid Throws Access Violation on Windows #9233
  • lineheight is broken #22197
  • Need Help with White Labeling a MAUI App from Existing Project #22182
  • SearchBar not expanding horizontally #10823
    Backlog
  • horizontal scrollable datepicker #22179
  • Pages not appearing in .NET MAUI app #20271
  • Maui ios app crash when using bindings for gradientstops #15919
  • Flyout open close with some lagging #21876
  • MAUI Shell Flyout unwanted click through behavior #21097
  • Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: 'No view found for id #21975
  • Not able to change the color of scroller and also scroller is not getting visible on verticalScroll="always* #19622
  • XAML ContentPage.Content required for data to appear. #21790
  • DatePicker not respecting UserAppTheme #21858
  • App assumes dark mode after resume on device with UIAlertController presented #21986

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] CarouselView: VirtualView cannot be null here, when clearing and adding items on second navigation - fix #22207
    community ✨
  • Remove implicit reference to Maui Compatibility and template references #22203
    area/templates 📄
  • fix: fix 22183 RadioButton checked value #22186
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-radiobutton

Merged

  • [Trimming] Enable analyzers in Controls.Xaml #21927
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Trimming] Enable analyzers in Controls.Core on Tizen #21925
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar, Under Consideration
  • Fixed On Platform="Default" not working #22148
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Enforce CA1854 performance analyzer #22100
    community ✨
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo and Mono dependencies #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • For XAML Hot Reload: Add public method to clear ResourceDictionary cache #22157
    area/tooling ⚙️, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area/templates 📄, community ✨
  • [XC] Compile "standalone" bindings #22023
    area/Xaml </>
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR6
  • [Android] Border Stroke gradient can only switch to another gradient - fix #22168
    platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
